pokedex_entries.Red / Blue: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokedex_entries.Yellow: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.Gold: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedex_entries.Silver: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedex_entries.Crystal: It crawls into foliage where it camouflages itself among leaves that are the same color as its body.
pokedex_entries.Ruby / Sapphire: CATERPIE has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this POKéMON releases a terrifically strong odor.
pokedex_entries.FireRed: It is covered with a green skin. When it grows, it sheds the skin, covers itself with silk, and becomes a cocoon.
pokedex_entries.LeafGreen: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokedex_entries.Emerald: Its voracious appetite compels it to devour leaves bigger than itself without hesitation. It releases a terribly strong odor from its antennae.
pokedex_entries.Diamond / Pearl / Platinum: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedex_entries.HeartGold: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedex_entries.SoulSilver: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedex_entries.Black / White / Black 2 / White 2: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
pokedex_entries.X: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antennae on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedex_entries.Y: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.
pokedex_entries.Omega Ruby / Alpha Sapphire: Caterpie has a voracious appetite. It can devour leaves bigger than its body right before your eyes. From its antenna, this Pokémon releases a terrifically strong odor.
pokedex_entries.Sun: When attacked by bird Pokémon, it resists by releasing a terrifically strong odor from its antennae, but it often becomes their prey.
pokedex_entries.Moon: It’s easy to catch, and it grows quickly, making it one of the top recommendations for novice Pokémon Trainers.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Sun: Perhaps because it would like to grow up quickly, it has a voracious appetite, eating a hundred leaves a day.
pokedex_entries.Ultra Moon: Its body is soft and weak. In nature, its perpetual fate is to be seen by others as food.
pokedex_entries.Let's Go Pikachu / Let's Go Eevee: If you touch the feeler on top of its head, it will release a horrible stink to protect itself.
pokedex_entries.Sword: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
pokedex_entries.Shield: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
pokedex_entries.Brilliant Diamond / Shining Pearl: It releases a stench from its red antennae to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.
